InstalledItem.Name: Slipstream
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Stealth

Tyler Design & Tech uses an expensive alloy on its Slipstream power plant to reduce its overall emissions. This design choice is key to making this small power plant’s detectable signature one of the lowest on the market.

InstalledItem.Name: HeatSafe
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Tyler Design & Tech	
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Pilots looking to keep their IR signature low rely on Tyler Design & Tech. As an entry level cooler, the HeatSafe not only limits emissions, it is built with Tyler’s satisfaction guarantee.

InstalledItem.Name: Shimmer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Ascension Astro
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Ascension Astro is known for one thing — quality stealth components. Their Shimmer shield generator was built not only to help avoid detection, but also provide protection when needed most.

InstalledItem.Name: Pelerous
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Blue Triangle Inc.
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Stealth

Aggressors can’t attack what they can’t see, so keep your signature low with the Pelorous stealth radar from Blue Triangle Inc.

InstalledItem.Name: Eos
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: RSI 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Eos quantum drive has been a staple in the RSI product line for centuries. Its original design was so perfectly fine-tuned that it has remained basically unchanged since.

InstalledItem.Name: Explorer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Explorer jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Hornet Ghost Center Cap
InstalledItem.Description: This special center cap designed for the Hornet Ghost features additional faceted surfaces to potentially help radiate incoming radar energy.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-322 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 3
Missiles: 2xS2

Behring’s MSD-322 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 3 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of two S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.
